titleStmt.title: A true coppy of a letter from the Right Honourable Lady, the Lady Elizabeth Hatton, left at the remove of her Honou[r]s houshold from Stoke near Windsor (upon hearing of Prince Ruperts approach towards those parts) to be delivered to his Excellencie.
titleStmt.author: Hatton, Elizabeth, Lady, 1578-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for VVilliam Ley,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Stoke the 24th. of October, 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
